## GtColumnMetadataArgs.immutable property

Defines this path as immutable. Mongoose prevents you from changing immutable paths unless the parent document has isNew: true.

 https://mongoosejs.com/docs/api.html\#schematype\_SchemaType-immutable

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
immutable?: boolean;
```
